title: Encouraging Economic Development in High-Poverty Rural Communities
content: For release on delivery  12:45 p.m. EST (11:45 p.m. CST)  February 12, 2019      Encouraging Economic Development in High-Poverty Rural Communities          Remarks by     Jerome H. Powell     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Rural Places, Rural Spaces: Closing Financial Services Gaps in Persistent Poverty  America,” a policy forum sponsored by Hope Enterprise Corporation     Mississippi Valley State University     Itta Bena, Mississippi                 February 12, 2019
